title: MD
biography: Sir Nicholas John White was a British medical doctor and researcher, specialising in tropical medicine in developing countries. He is known for his work on tropical diseases, especially malaria using artemisinin-based combination therapy.
aiSummary: Nicholas J. White is a tropical medicine specialist with an H-index of 187 at Mahidol University (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Nature, The Lancet Infectious Diseases. Based in Thailand.

citations.title: Advances and roadblocks in the treatment of malaria.
